attributes.contentHtml:
I'd like to interrupt this thread to remind everybody about keeping healthy.

Make sure to:

Eat your 5 a day
Get enough sleep
Drink enough water
Eat healthy food (Chocolate is not healthy BTW)
Don't date online and then breakup 10 minutes later
Don't open joke companies so people shit on you and then you get the depressed
Do your school work, it's more important than your online life
Education > a company that has a 90% chance of failing

Thanks for reading

attributes.title: [Community Vote] Should Puggo be banned + removed permanently from Drama.gg?
